trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> ou o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> método, e ele sinaliza que iniciou o processo de conexão (por exemplo, um usuário tem um controle selecionado e clicou em um verbo de conexão), mas ainda não foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: O evento fornece uma oportunidade de cancelar uma conexão antes de ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a conexão for concluída com êxito, esse evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> evento é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> método e sinaliza o fato de que um usuário clicou um verbo de desconexão, ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> método contrário tiver sido chamado.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: O evento fornece uma oportunidade de cancelar o processo de encerrar uma conexão antes de ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a conexão for concluída com êxito, esse evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler> delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler> delegado é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de página podem adicionar manipuladores personalizados para os eventos, adicionando o `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` e `OnWebPartsConnecting` atributos para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e atribuindo nomes de método personalizado para os atributos.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador personalizado também pode ser atribuído programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como atribuir programaticamente um manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: conectar-se métodos do manipulador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
